name: stashit
title: Stashit
description: A priority queue for managing tasks with priorities
author: pmzi

commands.name: stashit
commands.title: Add to Queue
commands.subtitle: Capture tasks with priority
commands.description: Add an item to the queue (syntax: task #queue priority)

commands.name: pop-stashit
commands.title: Queue Pop
commands.subtitle: Get highest priority task
commands.description: Pop the highest priority item from the queue

commands.name: view-stashit
commands.title: View Queue
commands.subtitle: Browse all tasks
commands.description: View all items in the priority queue
